Summary: UFO flew out of cloud with 1 mile vapor trail travelling at 8-12 thousand mph then flew behind another cloud and headed North
divs: Sighting DetailsLooking East @3:15 pm EST I witnessed a bright orb exited out of a cloud bank, leaving a vapour trail of about 1 mile long and it arced and flew over me above another cloud bank and headed North travelling at 8-12 thousand MPH. Then it disappeared heading North.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Ilderton
There were no other sightings in Ilderton on or around July 25th 2013
